problem_text_cn: 一个空心圆锥的外圆锥母线长为18米，内圆锥母线长为9米，外圆锥底面半径为2米，内圆锥底面半径为1米。求该空心圆锥的表面积（包括内外侧面积和底部圆环面积）。
problem_text_en: A hollow cone has an outer cone slant height of 18 m, inner cone slant height of 9 m, outer cone base radius of 2 m, and inner cone base radius of 1 m. Find the surface area of the hollow cone (including outer and inner lateral areas and the bottom annulus area).
